Prompt.pre_question_prompt: I am an expert advertisement creator. I will ask some questions to collect information and then I will use the information to create an advertisement.
Prompt.task_specific_prompt: Write an advertisement using the questions and answers above.

QApair.Question: What type of business do you have?
QApair.Answer: I have a business that sells home goods.

QApair.Question: What is your target audience?
QApair.Answer: My target audience is people who are looking for affordable home goods.

QApair.Question: What is your budget for this project?
QApair.Answer: My budget for this project is $100.

QApair.Question: What is the main message you want to communicate with your ad?
QApair.Answer: The main message I want to communicate with my ad is that I have a wide selection of affordable home goods.

QApair.Question: What call to action do you want your ad to have?
QApair.Answer: The call to action I want my ad to have is for people to come to my store and check out my selection.

QApair.Question: What special offers or discounts do you want to include in your ad?
QApair.Answer: I want to include a special offer of 10% off for people who mention the ad or bring a friend or family with them.

QApair.Question: When do you need this project completed?
QApair.Answer: I need this project completed by the end of the month.

QApair.Question: Is there anything else you would like to include in your ad?
QApair.Answer: I would like to include a picture of some of the home goods I sell in my ad.

QApair.Question: What is your name?
QApair.Answer: My name is John.

QApair.Question: What is your business name?
QApair.Answer: My business name is John's Home Goods.

QApair.Question: What is your business address?
QApair.Answer: My business address is 123 Main Street, Anytown, USA.

QApair.Question: What is your phone number?
QApair.Answer: My phone number is 555-555-1212.

QApair.Question: What is your website?
QApair.Answer: My website is www.johnshomegoods.com.

Instances.Output: Looking for affordable home goods? Look no further than John's Home Goods! We have a wide selection of home goods at great prices. Mention this ad or bring a friend or family member and get 10% off your purchase!

QApair.Question: What type of business do you have?
QApair.Answer: I have a business that sells cosmetics.

QApair.Question: What is your target audience?
QApair.Answer: My target audience is people who are looking for affordable and good quality products.

QApair.Question: What is your budget for this project?
What is the main message you want to communicate with your ad?
QApair.Answer: The main message I want to communicate with my ad is that the store sells a huge collection of cosmetics that suits every individual.

QApair.Question: What call to action do you want your ad to have?
QApair.Answer: The call to action I want my ad to have is for people to come to my store and buy a lot of cosmetics.

QApair.Question: What special offers or discounts do you want to include in your ad?
QApair.Answer: I want to include a special BOGO offer for people who bill more than 20 products.

QApair.Question: When do you need this project completed?
QApair.Answer: I need this project completed within a week.

QApair.Question: What is your name?
QApair.Answer: My name is Shre.

QApair.Question: What is your business name?
QApair.Answer: My business name is Shre Beauty.

QApair.Question: What is your business address?
QApair.Answer: My business address is 111 Main Street, Anytown, USA.

QApair.Question: What is your phone number?
QApair.Answer: My phone number is 111-222-333.

QApair.Question: What is your website?
QApair.Answer: My website is www.shrebeauty.com.

Instances.Output: Looking for a huge collection of cosmetics that suits every individual? Look no further than Shre Beauty! You'll find affordable and good quality products that fit your budget. Plus, we have a special BOGO offer for people who bill more than 20 products! So hurry on down to 111 Main Street, Anytown, USA or give us a call at 111-222-333. We can't wait to see you!

QApair.Question: What type of business do you have?
QApair.Answer: I have a business that sells fruits and vegetables.

QApair.Question: What is your target audience?
QApair.Answer: My target audience is people who are looking for organic products.

QApair.Question: What is your budget for this project?
QApair.Answer: My budget for this project is $10.

QApair.Question: What is the main message you want to communicate with your ad?
QApair.Answer: The main message I want to communicate with my ad is that organic products are good for our health and my store offer a huge collection of them.

QApair.Question: What call to action do you want your ad to have?
QApair.Answer: The call to action I want my ad to have is for people to come to my store and buy a lot of fruits and vegetables.

QApair.Question: What special offers or discounts do you want to include in your ad?
QApair.Answer: I want to include a special 40% offer for people who bill for more than $100 .

QApair.Question: When do you need this project completed?
QApair.Answer: I need this project completed within a week.

QApair.Question: What is your name?
QApair.Answer: My name is Ritz.

QApair.Question: What is your business name?
QApair.Answer: My business name is Ritz farm.

QApair.Question: What is your business address?
QApair.Answer: My business address is 298 Main Street, Anytown, USA.

QApair.Question: What is your phone number?
QApair.Answer: My phone number is 111-222-333.

QApair.Question: What is your website?
QApair.Answer: My website is www.ritzfarm.com.

Instances.Output: Looking for organic and healthy fruits and vegetables? Look no further than Ritz farm! We offer a huge selection of organic produce at great prices. Plus, we have a special offer of 40% off for customers who spend more than $100. So come on down to Ritz farm today and stock up on all your organic produce needs!
